finding.description: WCAG Reference Outdated: GEP policy references WCAG 2.1 as baseline while project has actually implemented WCAG 2.2 Level AA
finding.evidence: content/policies/gep/en.md:204; verified compliance WCAG 2.2 AA (Lighthouse: 96/100, Axe: 0 violations); source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:421-433
finding.impact: Factual inaccuracy in policy documentation; understates actual capabilities; creates unnecessary discrepancy between docs and implementation

actionItem.description: Update line 204 in content/policies/gep/{en,de,tr,es,fr,it}.md to reference WCAG 2.2 AA with link to verification documentation

finding.description: Performance Audit Data Stale: Lighthouse performance report contains null score with Chrome interstitial error, preventing verification of current metrics
finding.evidence: reports/lighthouse/performance.json (error: Chrome interstitial blocked page load); historical score: 92/100; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:142-179
finding.impact: Cannot verify current performance compliance against â‰¥90 threshold; data staleness prevents validation confidence

actionItem.description: Re-run Lighthouse performance audit with local server running; verify Core Web Vitals within targets; command: npm run build && npm run start & sleep 5 && npm run lh:perf

finding.description: Coverage Targets Ambiguous: GEP policy states coverage targets without clarifying if aspirational or currently achieved; Newsletter API: 98.73%, Global: 88.8%
finding.evidence: content/policies/gep/en.md:56-59; Newsletter API: 98.73% (verified), Global: 88.8%; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:645-678
finding.impact: Ambiguous framing could be interpreted as overstatement if readers assume universal achievement; clarity improves transparency

actionItem.description: Reframe as explicit targets with evidence of current state where achieved; recommend: 'We target 100% coverage for critical paths (achieved for Newsletter API: 98.73%) and 90%+ for core business logic (current global: 88.8%). Reports at coverage/lcov-report/.'

finding.description: Multilingual Semantic Equivalence Unverified: Policy pages available in 6 locales but native speaker verification of semantic equivalence, legal accuracy, and cultural appropriateness pending
finding.evidence: content/policies/{ethics,privacy,gep,imprint}/{de,tr,es,fr,it}.md (20 files); structural validation passed, semantic validation pending; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:741-771
finding.impact: Potential for unintentional misrepresentation if translations diverge semantically from English baseline; critical for international audiences

actionItem.description: Engage native speakers for each non-English locale (de, tr, es, fr, it) to verify semantic equivalence, legal term accuracy, cautious framing preservation, cultural appropriateness

finding.description: Evidence Links Missing in Ethics Policy: Three claims lack verifiable evidence links: 'Regular audits' (line 36), 'Diverse teams' (line 37), 'Regular public reporting' (line 50)
finding.evidence: content/policies/ethics/en.md:36-37,50; ledger operational, dashboard exists but not linked; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:324-382
finding.impact: Claims without evidence undermine transparency practices; readers cannot independently verify, reducing trust in governance commitments

actionItem.description: Add evidence links or reframe as aspirations; Line 36: link to /dashboard + quarterly a11y audits; Line 50: specify /dashboard location and update cadence

finding.description: Accessibility Testing Platform Coverage: Manual screen reader testing only completed for macOS VoiceOver (spot-checked); NVDA, JAWS, iOS VoiceOver pending
finding.evidence: Testing: VoiceOver (macOS) completed, NVDA/JAWS/iOS pending; automated: 0 violations; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:1010-1032
finding.impact: While automated testing provides confidence, comprehensive manual testing across platforms is best practice; undiscovered usability issues may exist for Windows users

actionItem.description: Complete comprehensive screen reader testing across NVDA, JAWS, iOS VoiceOver covering home, policy pages, newsletter form, language switcher, navigation (24 test scenarios)

finding.description: Diverse Teams Claim Lacks Evidence: Ethics policy states 'Diverse teams involved' (line 37) without supporting metrics, diversity reports, or compositional data
finding.evidence: content/policies/ethics/en.md:37; no diversity reports, team composition data, or hiring metrics available; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:336-366
finding.impact: Unverifiable claim creates potential perception of 'ethics washing'; limited impact as not central to compliance or product functionality

actionItem.description: Provide diversity metrics/reports OR reframe as aspiration; recommend Option A: 'We are actively working to build diverse teams across all aspects of design, development, and testing.'

finding.description: Regular Public Reporting Location Unspecified: Ethics policy commits to 'Regular public reporting' (line 50) without specifying location, frequency, or content
finding.evidence: content/policies/ethics/en.md:50; dashboard exists at /dashboard but not linked in claim; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:368-382
finding.impact: Readers cannot locate referenced public reporting, reducing transparency value; simple link addition would resolve

actionItem.description: Add specific link and clarify cadence; recommend: 'Public transparency reporting available at /dashboard, updated with each release and governance ledger entry.'

finding.description: Imprint Placeholder Data Incomplete: Legal Notice page contains multiple [INSERT: ...] placeholders for legally required information including business entity, registration, responsible persons, hosting provider, jurisdiction
finding.evidence: content/policies/imprint/{en,de,tr,es,fr,it}.md lines 20-23,26-29,47,57,61-68,117,136-137; status correctly marked 'in-progress'; source: AUDIT_OF_INTEGRITY_REPORT.md:456-496
finding.impact: Critical - blocks legal compliance under German Impressumspflicht and international regulations; prevents marking site as production-ready

actionItem.description: Complete all [INSERT: ...] placeholders with accurate legal entity information; obtain legal counsel review; update status to 'published'. Alternative (interim): add visible notice directing to legal@quantumpoly.ai

metadata.notes: Demonstration synthesis for Q4 2025 validation cycle; first operational use of feedback framework
